item.description:
Hi Packers,

Thank you to the 35 or 40 who turned out for the Detroit game, it was to close for comfort but we got the win in the end. Improvement will be needed against Washington this weekend; we will be meeting @ The Banshee (on the second floor) @ 1.00pm for the game. So far the crowds have been great, let’s keep it going. On a side note we have collected about 30 or so names for the “Tail Gate” party on December 19 for the Pats game, if you are interested and your name is not in yet please email me @ raybutler2000@earthlink.net to confirm your place. As always any feedback or suggestion’s are welcome, see you all on Sunday.

Best,

Packers Boston.

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay v Washington
